properties.address: 41 High Street, Hampshire, Hampshire PO12 1DF
properties.description: pop in for a coffee and a chat Everyone needs social connections to survive and thrive. But as people age, they often find themselves spending more time alone. Being alone may leave older adults more vulnerable to loneliness and social isolation, which can affect their health and well-being. Studies show that loneliness and social isolation are associated with higher risks for health problems such as heart disease, depression, and cognitive decline. If you are in poor health, you may be more likely to be socially isolated or lonely. If you are socially isolated or feeling lonely, it can put your physical and mental health at risk. Adults who are lonely or socially isolated are less healthy, have longer hospital stays, are readmitted to the hospital more often, and are more likely to die earlier than those with meaningful and supportive social connections.
properties.title: C2U Gosport

properties.description: Warm Space is open through out the year, term time only. Community Café is open all year round. Wednesday is aimed at local SO14 residents, it is family friendly. You will receive a warm welcome, refreshments, hot lunch and homemade cakes available on a 'pay as you can' basis. Come and enjoy a quiet sit down, there will be papers and books available or enjoy a chat or a game with one of our friendly volunteers and other guests. There is a separate room just next to the café for families with young children, with toys and a safe space to run around. Monthly Social Prescribers services available at the Warm Space. Community Café has been running for 16 years now and provides free two course hot meal, drinks and a great community, every Sunday. It's for any one in need and ideally over 18's. The team aims to provide a safe and friendly environment where all are welcome.
properties.title: Warm Space - Wednesdays, Community Café- Sundays
